DESCRIPTION: Play to draw a card, or keep them until the end of your turn to enter #yShowdown.
Receive the Showdown Effects from Poker Cards in you hand (max. 5 cards). They're boosted by Poker Hand you score.
Showdown Effect: Deal X damage to the enemy with the lowest HP.
Showdown Effect: Heal X HP. NL (Hearts have Ethereal.)
Showdown Effect: Deal X damage to all enemies.
The number of symbols on Poker Cards. The Showdown effect is proportional to the Rank.
The shape of Poker Cards determining the effect.
